titlestmt.titleproper: Beerbohm, Max, Sir, 1872-1956. Letters to Reginald Turner (bMS Eng 1098): Guide.

titlepage.titleproper: Beerbohm, Max, Sir, 1872-1956. Letters to Reginald Turner: Guide.
titlepage.author: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library
titlepage.p: Â© 2003 The President and Fellows of Harvard College

did.repository: Houghton Library, Harvard College Library, Harvard University
did.abstract: Letters of British author and caricaturist Max Beerbohm to British author Reginald Turner, largely on personal matters.

processinfo.p: The original finding aid for this collection was prepared in 1959. Item numbers were assigned at this time. Later scholarship found that this finding aid had some incorrect dates. The finding aid was updated by Bonnie B. Salt in July, 2003 and the dates applied at this time were taken from: Max Beerbohm. Letters to Reggie Turner, edited by Rupert Hart-Davis. London: R. Hart-Davis, 1964.
The letters in item (213) were restricted until January of 1984.
See the internal file for additional information.

acqinfo.p: Purchased by the Friends of the Library from Tania Jepson, 10, Orme Square, London W. 2; received: 1959 April 15.

bioghist.p: Beerbohm was a British author and caricaturist. Turner was a British author.

scopecontent.p: Consists of 221 letters from Beerbohm to Turner, a few with drawings, largely about personal matters.

did.unittitle: Beerbohm, Sir Max, 1872-1956. 214 letters to Reginald Turner:

note.p: drawing of Cissie Loftus and Max Beerbohm.

did.unittitle: Hotel des Pays Bas, Spa [20 Aug. 1891]

note.p: drawing of A.J.Balfour and R. Turner.
including A.L.s. of Florence (Kahn) Beerbohm, and drawings of Keir Hardie and Alfred Lambart.
These nine letters were restricted until Jan. 1984. Typed excerpts from 8 of these letters are listed above as nos. 6, 41, 45, 49, 76, 123, 136, 152, 199.

Includes the following letters:
(213a) 19, Hyde Park Place, W., London, [late June 1892] 1s. (4p.) See also item (45).
(213b) 19, Hyde Park Place, W., London, [Late June 1892] 1s. (4p.) See also item (6).
(213c) 19 Hyde Park Place, London, [3 Dec. 1893] 1s. (4p.) env. See also item (41).
(213d) 19 Hyde Park Place, London, [19 Dec. 1893] 3s. (12p.) env. See also item (49).
(213e) St. Mary's Abbey, Windermere, Easter Sunday, [18 Apr.] 1897. 1s. (4p.) env. See also item (76).
(213f) Castell San Giorgio, Portofino, Liguria, 26 Nov. 1907. 1s. (2p.) env. See also item (136).
(213g) 48 Upper Berkeley Street, W., [8 Nov. 1909] 1s. (4p.) env. See also item (123).
(213h) Villino Chiaro, Rapallo, 20 June 1921. 2s. (4p.) env. See also item (152).
(213i) Villino Chiaro, Rapallo, 14 Oct. 1927. 2s. (4p.) env. See also item (199).

did.unittitle: Beerbohm, Max, Sir, 1872-1956. Letters to Reggie Turner, edited by Rupert Hart-Davis : proofs with AMs annotations by William H. Bond, 1964.

note.p: This volume serves as a concordance between the Houghton collection item numbers of the Beerbohm letters and the listing in the published work.
